title: 2BR/1BA Midtown- Walk to Piedmont Park !
posting_body: ['One block from gorgeous Piedmont Park - short walks to the park, Trader Joes, and restaurants.', 'This two bedroom apartment is great for roommates or home office.', 'Spacious living areas and excellent closet space.', 'Off street parking and on site laundry.', 'Great Midtown location!!!', 'Call to tour:', 'show contact info', 'See all our Available Apartments on our web site <URL>', 'Rent $1695', 'Deposit $1595', 'Application Fee $75', 'Utilities Needed - Gas & Electric', 'Water Fee $75/month', 'Portal Fee $5/month', 'Parking | Off Street Parking Available', 'Laundry | On Site Laundry Facility', 'Central Heating', 'Window A/C', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwoods', 'Pet Friendly!', '$300 Dog (max.1) | $100 Cat (max.2)', 'Come tour the charm and elegance our vintage modern apartment offers', 'show contact info', 'See additional listings online <URL>', '#stoplookingstartliving']
